author: Huawei
description: "We have to constantly redesign our business processes to stay competitive," says Bariş Çalişkan of Türkiye Işbank. Facing this challenge across 2,800 branches, his solution was a partnership with #Huawei. The resulting "Easy-Branch" system provides a digital map of the entire network, increasing deployment efficiency tenfold. Now, they're pioneering the future by working toward a Level 4 autonomous network. Watch for more: https://bit.ly/4ox0pc0 #TransformTalks #ThisIsHuawei #HUAWEICONNECT
title: Transforming a Vast Network, One Branch at a Time

author: Huawei
description:
Classrooms in Seychelles are going digital — powered by smart tech and bold partnerships. With #Huawei's SMART Education solution now live in four Secondary Schools, students and teachers are experiencing interactive lessons, real-time assessments, and remote learning like never before.
 
Watch the interview with Mr. John Lesperance, Principal Secretary of the Ministry of Education, and hear firsthand how Huawei is helping deliver #SmartEducation across Seychelles.
title: Smart Education Solutions Transform Classrooms in Seychelles
